docs.text: Sudhakar's Notebook Welcome to my Personal Blog . Feel free to browse around. Business Kit This is the most ambitious project I'm working on currently. I believe the future is moving towards Creators, Entrepreneurs, Freelancers and Consultants than the standard 9 to 5 Jobs. I want to support them to upto speed in business topics. I am reading big bulky books and condense them into digestable concepts. Other Essays The Essays that doesn't fit to above criteria are filled here. When some topic is getting repeated frequently, It will get its own category. Book Summaries To do Business Kit project well, I've to read lots of books. When I get something significant out of the book, I'll try to write them. It is mostly my reflections and take aways from them book.
